name: Kamikaze Colonies
description:
Sacrifices must be made to secure the future of the Mars colonies!

Steer Colonist shuttles into impending asteroids to veer them off course!

Spend sacrificed souls to buy upgrades...
Survive as long as you can!

VetherGen           -- Programming / Art / Design
Foxlox                     -- Art
InfinityForger9 -- Design / SFX / Balance
Lewis H Music   -- Soundtrack
